title: 2015: Games in League still start even without every player connected and fully loaded
body:
Why? Just why?

- DotA 2; aborts the match, finds a new game.
- Heroes of the Storm; Aborts the matchmaking, and if it still loads gives you an AI teammate to replace them
- SMITE; similar

Etc. for other multiplayer games.

But in League, we're still forced to play games that start 4v5, or wind up 4v5 right at the beginning.

It's just...amazing at this point. You'd think they'd do it for the Pros and Diamond+ people at the least, since they hate it the most.
